EmailTemplate.subject: AERO Patent Watch - June 2015
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Email Title June 2015
Please find a link to the Aero Patent Watch – June 2015. The Aero Patent Watch provides a monthly view of published or granted patents by the U.S. Patent and Trademark office by Honeywell or peer companies in our area of interest (Direct Link to Patents by Assignee <http://goaero.honeywell.com/TfZQL0604000RIg20q6vGX0>).
As new issues are released, prior issues are moved to the Archive <http://goaero.honeywell.com/y4LQRv6Z0G0qXIh06g00020" target="_blank"><span style=> section. Additional Aero IP processes and background information is available at the Aero IP Community Wiki. <http://goaero.honeywell.com/E0G0Q06hIiR0Z0vX2L06q04" target="_blank"><span style=>
In this edition, product line classification has been renamed to align with Aerospace Gold Enterprises: CBM & Services/Aero Services >>> Aerospace Services Electric Power Systems>>> Electric Power Environmental Control Systems>>>Thermal Systems (ECS) Navigation & Sensors-Space>>> Space Propulsion Systems >>> Engines SIM-Communications>>>Safety and Connectivity-CNIS SIM-Surveillance>>> Safety and Connectivity-Surveillance Wheels & Brakes>>> Wheels and Braking Systems
If you have any questions, please let me know.
Thank you, Dan Dan Gutfreund IP Process Leader Aerospace, Advanced Technology, Technology Strategy 21111 N 19th Ave (M/S 2J35A5) Phoenix, AZ 85027 Phone: +1 602 436-9030 Mobile: +1 480 258-8692 Dan.Gutfreund@Honeywell.com <http://goaero.honeywell.com/CI600T0bq0uQ0ZGR2v04X06> Privacy Statement <http://honeywell.com/Privacy> Terms & Conditions <http://honeywell.com/Pages/TermsConditions.aspx> © 2015 Honeywell International Inc. <http://www.honeywell.com>
